Name: Maximize Team Availability
Description: Ensure that employees assigned have high availability

Name: Minimize Project Duration
Description: Reduce the time between project start and end

Name: Maximize Velocity
Description: Maximize average work delivered per sprint

Name: Maximize Skill Match
Description: Assign employees whose skills match the required feature competencies

Name: Maximize Sprint Goal Achievement
Description: Ensure sprints fulfill their intended goals

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Ensure high satisfaction and participation from stakeholders

Name: Maximize Budget Efficiency
Description: Use the budget efficiently while meeting requirements

Name: Maximize Task Completion Rate
Description: Complete as many assigned sprint tasks as possible
